meanings.definition: To the extent or degree indicated or understood.
meanings.sent1: She has only walked sofar today.
meanings.sent2: He has not eaten sofar this morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat has napped sofar, but now it's time to play.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her studies has taken her sofar in her academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner has run sofar without stopping.

meanings.definition: Up to this point or extent.
meanings.sent1: I have read sofar in the book.
meanings.sent2: They have traveled sofar on their road trip.
meanings.sent3: The cake has baked sofar, but it still needs more time in the oven.
meanings.sent4: His savings have grown sofar, but he aims for more.
meanings.sent5: The team has won every game sofar this season.
